lines.text:
[to Jenny]
Your uncle's dead! I'm John Lawrence in these doggings -- and I'm not going to let any fool kid spoil my game!
I love you! Do you understand?
Promise me you'll help me, and I'll play straight.
I'd rather take in washin' the rest of my life than let you be a thief.
Boys - I reckon when twenty men have been fooled by one small woman - - they'd better take their medicine!
